abstract: The economic slump has created a tricky situation for Beijing, as it tries to shepherd the economy through a transition.
snippet: The economic slump has created a tricky situation for Beijing, as it tries to shepherd the economy through a transition.
lead_paragraph: DONGGUAN, China — Walking around an abandoned furniture factory, Fang Minghua pointed out the workshops where several hundred employees once toiled, transforming sheets of raw wood into TV stands or wardrobes for the aspiring middle class in China and other emerging economies.

headline.main: China’s Fading Factories Weigh on an Already Slowing Economy
